grid.title: Percolation Editor
grid.author: Cell Society Team 5
grid.description: This configuration shows an empty Percolation grid for users to create their own layout. Click on a cell to cycle through its states (White = Open, Black = Blocked, Blue = Percolated). First pause the simulation, change cells to the desired values, save the configuration, then reload the configuration. Now you can reset the simulation any time.
